channel.title: Free acount
channel.description:
Like the topic eh? well ok i bought an acount off sythe and the guy recovered a week later. I got him banned off sythe and he came to me and said that his friend recovered it and he changed the pass and gave me back the acount. today the same thing happened except this time i told him that his friend recovered it and that i really needed it to get it to 76 fishing. After that he gave me the pass and now im trying to get it banned like theres no tommorow. i went to the majour trading places and used fagex's spammer. i think im muted but no luck other than that. He can easily recover the acount but im not sure how he does it. Heres the catch.give me a convincing way that you will be able to make the acount unrecoverable and its all yours. please note i will not giv it to leechers. and if nothing happens i will pm the details tonight to mopar and he can have it as a thanx.
heres the stats: [IMG]http://img269.imageshack.us/img269/1109/stats1gr.png[/img]

item.title: Free acount
item.dc:creator: @intheknow intheknow
item.description:
@intheknow wrote:

If it is a member, you can’t go wrong spamming the forums.

The problem is making it seem legit. Don’t say random swear words and babble about nonsense, they can see through your plan.

Step 1. Get on there and start talking about Fagex ripping you off, how you hate runescape now, the world, the forums, yourself, etc. Step 2. Repeat.

Read full topic

item.title: Free acount
item.dc:creator: @MujaheD Radeon
item.description:
@MujaheD wrote:

Heres the complete story. I saw an add for a guy that wanted to sell an acount on sythe. I agreed and when we got an mm the mm said that the answers to the recovery question which the scammer provided were wrong. The scammer said they worked for him. i was all convinced so i bought the acount. about a week later the pass was changed. i told him and he said it was his friend who recovered it and he re-recovered and gave me the pass. But by then he was already IP banned offf sythe. A few days later the pass changed again i knew it was obviously him. I was desperate to ban the acount so i told him that his friend recovered it again and asked him if he could recover it for me because i wanted to get it to 76 fishing. that day i got the fishing lvl from 73 to 74 through aryan however the acount wasnt banned. I went to fagex.net and got their spammer and used it (ill post the spammer in next post). i used it in most majour trade places and also in the catherby lob fishing area. so many people reported me it wasnt funny. after that i thought it was no use trying to get the acount banned so i just started getting flax. it got around 1500 flax and 486 lobs so i decided i want to sell. i went to world 2 and when i tried to log in it said your acount has been disabled please check your message center for details.i quickly went there and used up the apeal. in the apeal i confessed to the crime. Then on msn i told him that i knew he was scamming me all along and that i got the acount banned. He was away and he came on later after that this is what he said [QUOTE]ஐ◄███▓▒░░Sean Owens░░▒▓███►ஐ…I Love You Sooo Much Caitlin XOXOXOXOXO You Are My WorldHappy Ten Months says:
WHAT!!
ஐ◄███▓▒░░Sean Owens░░▒▓███►ஐ…I Love You Sooo Much Caitlin XOXOXOXOXO You Are My WorldHappy Ten Months says:
man it was my friend… i havnt talked to him because i have mono…
ஐ◄███▓▒░░Sean Owens░░▒▓███►ஐ…I Love You Sooo Much Caitlin XOXOXOXOXO You Are My WorldHappy Ten Months says:
but i get to see himtoday to make him stop but ok your loss of the acc
А М Σ Гâ„¢ Â® â€¢Ã¯Â¡Ã·Â¡Ã¯â€¢ The Brotherhood Once Provoked Shall Be Unstopable[IM AWAY DOING HOMEWORK NUBZ] says:
what about i blink bye?
А М Σ Гâ„¢ Â® â€¢Ã¯Â¡Ã·Â¡Ã¯â€¢ The Brotherhood Once Provoked Shall Be Unstopable[IM AWAY DOING HOMEWORK NUBZ] says:
i don wanna ban any more acounts
ஐ◄███▓▒░░Sean Owens░░▒▓███►ஐ…I Love You Sooo Much Caitlin XOXOXOXOXO You Are My WorldHappy Ten Months says:
what did the msg say
А М Σ Гâ„¢ Â® â€¢Ã¯Â¡Ã·Â¡Ã¯â€¢ The Brotherhood Once Provoked Shall Be Unstopable[IM AWAY DOING HOMEWORK NUBZ] says:
4got
ஐ◄███▓▒░░Sean Owens░░▒▓███►ஐ…I Love You Sooo Much Caitlin XOXOXOXOXO You Are My WorldHappy Ten Months says:
fuck u
[/QUOTE]

and i blink bye was an acount which he offered to me as a bonus because the original acount had recovs set. now this is the perfect chance to say:
0wn3d pl0x?
[br][size=1]Posted at: April 25, 2006, 11:04:48 pm[/size][hr]He later blocked me. ok heres the scar script which should be able to get you banned!:

[CODE]{.Script Info:

ScriptName = Spamfest 2006

Author = Bego + Darippy

Description = Spams Jagex hating text

Version = 3.6

Date = Feb. 14/06

Comments = Spams fast!

/Script Info}

{ __ _ _ _
/ _ ___ _ () __ | | | |_ _ _ _
/ | '| | '_ | | | ’ | | | |()
_ (_| | | | |) | |_ | |) | || | _
_/___|| || .__/ _| |.__/ _, |()
|| |___/

               ____ 
              /  _` 
                       __     __     ___ 
                  _ <'  /'__` /'_ `  / __` 
                    /  __//   /    
                  \____/ \____ \____  \____/ 
                  /___/  /____//___  /___/ 
                                   /\____/ 
                                   \_/__/                }

{Instructions:

  1. Do the setup
  2. Run the script…

Try to learn how to use yourself if your SCAR illiterate
Please do not edit underneath this! }

(* DArippy9324 has and will continue to help bego w/ this script *)

program SpamFestBego;

var
frmDesign : TForm;
Label1 : TLabel;
Label2 : TLabel;
Edit1 : TEdit;
Edit2 : TEdit;
Button1 : TButton;
prefix : String;
waittime : Integer;

procedure clickthebutton(sender: TObject);
begin
frmDesign.ModalResult:= mrOk;
end;

procedure InitForm;
begin
frmDesign := CreateForm;
frmDesign.Left := 341;
frmDesign.Top := 317;
frmDesign.Width := 304;
frmDesign.Height := 118;
frmDesign.Caption := ‘Setup’;
frmDesign.Color := clBtnFace;
frmDesign.Font.Color := clWindowText;
frmDesign.Font.Height := -11;
frmDesign.Font.Name := ‘MS Sans Serif’;
frmDesign.Font.Style := [];
frmDesign.Visible := False;
frmDesign.PixelsPerInch := 96;
Label1 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
Label1.Parent := frmDesign;
Label1.Left := 8;
Label1.Top := 10;
Label1.Width := 150;
Label1.Height := 13;
Label1.Caption := ‘Prefix (effects ex. glow3,wave,)’;
Label2 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
Label2.Parent := frmDesign;
Label2.Left := 6;
Label2.Top := 35;
Label2.Width := 211;
Label2.Height := 13;
Label2.Caption := ‘Wait Time (the time to wait in between texts):’;
Edit1 := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
Edit1.Parent := frmDesign;
Edit1.Left := 162;
Edit1.Top := 9;
Edit1.Width := 121;
Edit1.Height := 21;
Edit1.TabOrder := 8;
Edit2 := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
Edit2.Parent := frmDesign;
Edit2.Left := 220;
Edit2.Top := 32;
Edit2.Width := 40;
Edit2.Height := 21;
Edit2.MaxLength := 4;
Edit2.TabOrder := 9;
Button1 := TButton.Create(frmDesign);
Button1.Parent := frmDesign;
Button1.OnClick:= @clickthebutton;
Button1.Left := 110;
Button1.Top := 56;
Button1.Width := 75;
Button1.Height := 25;
Button1.Caption := ‘Start Script’;
Button1.TabOrder := 10;
end;

procedure SafeInitForm;
var
v: TVariantArray;
begin
setarraylength(V, 0);
ThreadSafeCall(‘InitForm’, v);
end;

procedure ShowFormModal;
begin
frmDesign.ShowModal;
end;

procedure SafeShowFormModal;
var
v: TVariantArray;
begin
setarraylength(V, 0);
ThreadSafeCall(‘ShowFormModal’, v);
end;

procedure Sendit(text:string);
begin
sendkeys(text+chr(13));
wait(waittime+random(waittime/2));
end;

procedure spam;
var
randnum: integer;
begin
randnum:=random(21)
case randnum of
0: Sendit(prefix+‘go fuacking die jagex’);
1: Sendit(prefix+‘FUACK JAGEX!!’);
2: Sendit(prefix+‘WHY BAN US?!!’);
3: Sendit(prefix+‘ANDREW CAN KISS MY ASSE!’);
4: Sendit(prefix+‘go fuacking die jagex’);
5: Sendit(prefix+‘autoers WILL prevail!’);
6: Sendit(prefix+‘Paul can suack my diack!’);
7: Sendit(prefix+‘i hope runescape dies and burns!’);
8: Sendit(prefix+‘mass banning - this should lag your server!’);
9: Sendit(prefix+‘GO AHEAD, BAN US, WE COULD CARE LESS FUACK HEADS!’);
10: Sendit(prefix+‘Oh no, the big scary Jmod will ban us… fuack you’);
11: Sendit(prefix+‘i hope you die you dirty fucks!’);
12: Sendit(prefix+‘SPAMFEST 2006, 313!’);
13: Sendit(prefix+‘sueing kaitnieks, tut tut’);
14: Sendit(prefix+‘Macroers always win!’);
15: Sendit(prefix+‘You may have banned us, but were back and better!’);
16: Sendit(prefix+‘Jagex… more like fahgex’);
17: Sendit(prefix+‘Lol, mute me, fahggets’);
18: Sendit(prefix+‘Fuck jagex, fuck pmods, fuck mod dan!’);
19: Sendit(prefix+‘Fuck andrew, ian, paul, daniel, mark and all of u!!!’);
20: Sendit(prefix+‘Fuck yourselves in a corner jagex!1!11’);
end;
end;

procedure UpdateCheck;
var
version, current : string;
begin
current:=‘3.6’;
version:=Trim(GetPage(‘http://www.risetolive.com/forums/scripts/spamfest.html’));
if (version = current) then
begin
Writeln(‘You have the latest version of this script!’);
end else
begin
if (version <> ‘’) then
begin
Writeln(’ ');
Writeln('Current Version = '+current);
Writeln('Newest Version = ‘+version);
Writeln(‘Please get the newest version from:’);
Writeln(‘http://www.risetolive.com/forums/scripts/spamfest2006.scar’);
Writeln(’ ‘);
TerminateScript;
end else
begin
Writeln(’ ‘);
Writeln(‘The server is down that is used for update checking!’);
Writeln(‘Please be patient and wait for it to be back up’);
Writeln(’ ');
TerminateScript;
end;
end;
end;

begin
UpdateCheck;
SafeInitForm;
SafeShowFormModal;
prefix:=Edit1.Text;
waittime:=strtoint(Edit2.Text);
Writeln(‘You are using Begos Spammer for Spamfest 2006’);
Writeln(‘You have 3 seconds to get to a runescape screen!’);
Writeln(‘3 (Self Minimizing)’);
Wait(1000);
Writeln(‘2 (Self Minimizing)’);
Wait(1000);
Writeln(‘1 (Self Minimizing)’);
Wait(1000);
Writeln(‘Starting script!’);
GetApplication.Minimize;
repeat
spam;
until(false)
end.[/CODE]

thanx to fagex.net for the script. also the guy has blocked me now.

0wn3d pl0x?

Read full topic

ACOUNT SUCCESSFULLY BANNED. im proud to say that. i also used up the ban apeal so the guy couldnt apeal.

Thankyou for doing so i have learnt my lesson and do not intend to repeat what i have done. BTW i didnt intend to say what i said about jagex, it was for a bet lol ye i know im childish. Sorry to waste your time

and to all those who dont believe me heres the acount details:
Username: r_h_y_m_e
password: magenta
